## Mapping

## Task 1 
Install bwa from here: https://github.com/lh3/bwa#getting-started

## Task 2
Create the index for our reference (`bwa index ref.fa`). The fasta file is located here: `/opt/data/reference/`

## Task 3
Execute paired-end alignment. Files are located here: `/opt/data/fastq`
Command should look something like this:
`bwa mem /opt/data/reference/kiv2_6.fasta <file1> <file2> > aligned-file.sam`

## Task 4 
Execute `samtools sort aligned-file.sam > aligned-file.bam` to sort the file

## Task 5 
Go to [this page](http://quinlanlab.org/tutorials/samtools/samtools.html) and learn about `samtools sort` `samtools index` and `samtools view`.
